display_long_description:
# DEMO 
this is a demo, but we will continue to update. If you have any suggestions for the game, you can leave a message in the comment area. We will listen to your suggestions seriously.  
👉join our discord: **https://discord.gg/qFH62yNHV9**  
# PERFORMANCE AND SALARY  
As a boss, your main task is to rate your employees and pay them salaries. You need to mark ✅ or ❌ according to the employee content displayed on the iPad to generate performance and pay salaries to employees. You can use a lot of interesting and cool props to prank your employees and put their salaries into your own coffers.
[media]
# FEEDING EMPLOYEES   
Give employees chicken legs🍖 to gain their gratitude and improve their favorability.

# USE PROPS TO PRANK EMPLOYEES  
Throw watermelon rinds🍉 at employees' feet and hit them with baseball bats.
#  BUY ITEMS  
You can buy new items💣 in the store to make the game more interesting. These props will bring you a different experience. HAVE FUN!!!
[media]
# CONTINUOUS UPDATES  
We will continue to update🚀 the Demo until the EA version is released. More items and character reactions will be added to the game. If you have any suggestions, please leave a message in the comment area to let us know. Thanks!
